statements: DELETE FROM student_engagement WHERE student_id = 101 AND performance_score < 70;
DELETE FROM student_engagement WHERE engagement_level > 3 AND performance_score BETWEEN 80 AND 90;
DELETE FROM students WHERE engagement_level < 50 AND performance_score > 80;
DELETE FROM activities WHERE category = 'sports' OR (completion_status = TRUE AND completion_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM student_activities WHERE student_id = 1 AND activity_id = 1;
DELETE FROM student_activities WHERE student_id = 1 AND activity_id = 2;
